    Set Up Your Custom Node

    Instructions can be found here

    Your node must be HTTPS in order to connect to it via Airon.io. You can [download the Airon.io repo & run it locally](https://github.com/kvhnuke/etherwallet/releases/latest) to connect to your local node. Or, get free SSL certificate via [LetsEncrypt](https://letsencrypt.org/).

    Add an Account to Watch:

    You can add any account to "watch" on the wallets tab without uploading a private key. This does ** not ** mean you have access to this wallet, nor can you transfer Ether from it.

    Airon.io does not hold your keys for you. We cannot access accounts, recover keys, reset passwords, nor reverse transactions. Protect your keys & always check that you are on correct URL. You are responsible for your security.

    Airon © {{getYear()}}

    Disclaimer

    Be safe & secure: We highly recommend that you read our guide on How to Prevent Loss & Theft for some recommendations on how to be proactive about your security.

    Always backup your keys: Airon.io & Airon.io CX are not "web wallets". You do not create an account or give us your funds to hold onto. No data leaves your computer / your browser. We make it easy for you to create, save, and access your information and interact with the blockchain.

    We are not responsible for any loss: Ethereum, Airon.io & Airon.io CX, and some of the underlying Javascript libraries we use are under active development. While we have thoroughly tested & tens of thousands of wallets have been successfully created by people all over the globe, there is always the possibility something unexpected happens that causes your funds to be lost. Please do not invest more than you are willing to lose, and please be careful.

    Translations of Airon.io: The community has done an amazing job translating Airon.io into a variety of languages. However, Airon.io can only verify the validity and accuracy of the information provided in English and, because of this, the English version of our website is the official text.

    What is Airon

    • Airon is a free, open-source, comfortable client-side interface
    • You can create your new custom ERC20 token
    • You and only you are responsible for your security
    • Multisig wallet*

    Remember

    • If you send your public key (address) to someone, they can send you ETH or tokens.
    • If you send your private key to someone, they now have full control of your account.
    • If you lose your public and private key then you lose your tokens
    • We never transmit, receive or store your private key, password, or other account information.
    • We cannot recover your funds or freeze your account if you visit a phishing site or lose your private key.

    *coming after march 2018
